translation.en: ♪ There once was a ma that wanted her… ♪
Are you kidding me? Rust Bank Brewery is the heart of this town.
translation.es: ¿Bromean? La cervecería es el corazón de la ciudad.

translation.en: No deal, Mr. and Mrs. Klaxon.
- Do you realize who I am? - We are not selling the brewery.
translation.es: ¿Sabe quién soy? No venderemos la cervecería. Ni a ustedes ni a nadie.

translation.en: Not to you or anyone else.
translation.es: No venderemos la cervecería. Ni a ustedes ni a nadie.

translation.en: You shut that down, Delroy? It's over, Wilma.
I told him more beer, less prisons.
My library is set for the year.
- Before you put Mr. Fawzi out of business. - Daddy!
Uh… Uh, dessert!  No, honey, you'll pop.
translation.es: - ¡El postre! - No, cielo. Vas a explotar.

translation.en: Delroy, honey, pull over. I don't like this. W- We'll be fine, Wilma.
translation.es: - Delroy, amor, detente. No me gusta esto. - No pasa nada, Wilma.

translation.en: ♪ I'd like to get to know you… ♪
- Kat, you need to swim like we taught you. - No!
- Mama! Aren't you coming? - Right behind you, baby!
Mama, I'm scared! Now, listen to me, baby.
- You need to take a deep breath. -
One scream, and my parents were gone.
translation.es: Un grito, y perdí a mis padres.

translation.en: Figured I'd just hate myself for the rest of my life.
translation.es: Pensé que me odiaría por el resto de mi vida.
Pero el destino tenía otros planes.

translation.en: They say everyone's got demons, right?
Welcome to the scariest place in the Underworld.
translation.es: Bienvenidos al lugar más aterrador del inframundo.

translation.en: and this is the Scream Faire!
translation.es: ¡y esta es la Feria de los Gritos!

translation.en: Okay, that's it! W- W- Wild, you're doin' it again!
- Doing what, Wendell? - Stealin' the hair cream!
That's just a bad plug right there. That's what that is.
translation.es: Ese implante no sirve. Es eso.

translation.en: - Why'd you plant it? - It's not a bad plug.
translation.es: Ese implante no sirve. Es eso. No, tú le quitaste los nutrientes que necesita.

translation.en: You're depriving that plug of its rightful nutrients.
translation.es: No, tú le quitaste los nutrientes que necesita.

translation.en: Need I remind you? It's your fault Belzer put us in jail for treason!
translation.es: ¿Debo recordártelo? Esto es tu culpa. ¡Belzer nos encarceló por traición!

translation.en: And if he goes bald, he'll skin us both alive!
translation.es: Y, si se queda calvo, ¡nos matará a los dos!

translation.en: I'm not worried, Wendell. You're the one shootin' blanks.
As your older brother, I demand you regurgitate that cream!
translation.es: Como tu hermano mayor, ¡exijo que la regurgites!

translation.en: Now, why would I do that? Wendell…
fresh cream ain't gonna revivify a bad plug. Did you just admit you've been stealing it?
translation.es: - La crema no revivirá ese implante. - ¿Admites que la robaste?

translation.en: 'Cause it tickles my tummy. That's the dumbest thing I've… What?
translation.es: - Da cosquillas en la pancita. - Qué tont… ¿Qué?

translation.en: I'm gonna kill you! I'mma throttle you from here to next Tue--
Oh, hey, you right! That does feel kinda good.
- Yeah, and the best part… - Oh?
I'm having a-- a vision, Wild!
You see her too? I do.
- And back to work! - Whoa! Uh, whoa!
With my folks dead, the next five years were hell.
translation.es: Quedé huérfana y los siguientes 5 años fueron terribles.

translation.en: Yeah, I got into a little trouble.
But at 13, I got a do- over at this fancy girls' school, RBC.
translation.es: Pero, a los 13, pude volver a empezar en una escuela para niñas, RBC.
era que estaba en Rust Bank.

translation.en: ♪ I will come to your river ♪ ♪ I will come to your river ♪
What? The bridge. You had a panic attack.
It was at your parents' memorial. What?
translation.es: - En el funeral de tus padres. - ¿Qué?

translation.en: You were already in the group home upstate. You didn't need more bad news.
translation.es: Ya estabas en el norte, en el hogar. No necesitabas más malas noticias.

translation.en: Home definitely wasn't what it used to be.
translation.es: Mi hogar definitivamente no era lo que solía ser.

translation.en: Seems that brewery fire had a domino effect, and the whole town had died.
translation.es: El incendio tuvo un efecto dominó, y toda la ciudad había muerto.

translation.en: But it wasn't just a do- over. Something else up at that school was pulling me back.
translation.es: Pero no fue solo un nuevo comienzo. Algo en esa escuela me atraía.

translation.en: Something that knew what I was before I did.
translation.es: Algo que supo lo que era antes que yo.

translation.en: What sort of girls go here? Prize poodles. All Best in Show.
translation.es: - ¿Qué clase de niñas estudian aquí? - Caniches premiados. Los mejores.

translation.en: Rust Bank Catholic was the first school to sign up for Break the Cycle.
translation.es: Fue la primera escuela en inscribirse en Rompe el Ciclo.

translation.en: I bet my grandma's fry bread recipe on you.
translation.es: Aposté la receta de mi abuela.

translation.en: First of the month! - - Now you say…
translation.es: - Bienvenida a Rust Bank. - Y tú…

translation.en: - A slap and a kick for being so quick. - What?

translation.es: Y ella es Gabby la cabra.

translation.en: - Don't be shy, Katherine Koniqua Elliot. - It's Kat!
Ugh! No, thanks! New name, new beginning!
It's your do- over, Kay- Kay. - And we're going to help you heal. -
translation.es: Es tu segunda oportunidad. Te ayudaremos a sanar.

translation.en: There's holistic goat yoga each noon. Feed your soul, not your waistline.
translation.es: - Hay yoga con cabras al mediodía. - Alimenta el alma, no la cintura.

translation.en: Evenings, we meditate for the environment.
The earth resonates beneath our bums. And best of all…
translation.es: - La tierra resuena bajo tu trasero. - Y lo mejor…

translation.en: Our Fashion for World Peace event!
translation.es: ¡El evento Moda para la Paz Mundial!

translation.en: Who knows? Prison Chic could be the next big thing.
translation.es: Quizá el estilo prisionera chic tenga éxito.

translation.en: Now, let's get you moved in. Hey, don't touch!
translation.es: - Te ayudaremos a instalarte. - Oye, ¡no toques!

translation.en: Did you see what she did?
Kay- Kay just saved my life!
- This way, Miss Elliot. - Headmaster's waiting.
translation.es: - Por aquí, señorita Elliot. - El director la espera.

translation.en: What's going on, Siobhan? How did she see it coming?
I don't know. But I have a feeling Kay- Kay's the best thing to happen here in a long time.
translation.es: No sé. Creo que Kay-Kay es lo mejor que nos ha pasado en mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Ah! Welcome home, Miss Elliot, to Rust Bank.
translation.es: Bienvenida a casa, señorita Elliot, a Rust Bank.

translation.en: And now, you're gonna kick me out.
translation.es: Y ahora me va a echar.

translation.en: Oh, no! You just arrived, Miss Elliot. But you shoulda broke your back.
translation.es: - No. Recién llega, señorita Elliot. - Debería haberse roto la espalda.

translation.en: Uh, God willing, we're going to break the cycle.
translation.es: Si Dios quiere, vamos a romper el ciclo.

translation.en: A second chance for girls like you. Yeah.
translation.es: Una segunda oportunidad para niñas como usted, sí.

translation.en: This school's in trouble, isn't it? You need that Break the Cycle money.
translation.es: La escuela necesita el dinero de Rompe el Ciclo.

translation.en: Ah, and you… You need a fresh start.
translation.es: Y usted necesita un nuevo comienzo.

translation.en: I told them, bring this damaged child home.
translation.es: Les dije: Traigan a esa niña problemática.

translation.en: Surround her with the best and brightest, and Katherine Koniqua Elliot--
translation.es: Rodeada de los más brillantes, Katherine Koniqua Elliot…
Ahora eres una niña de RBC.

translation.en: No, that brick was loose. Eyes ahead. You're drawing attention.
translation.es: - No, el ladrillo estaba suelto. - Mira al frente. Llamas la atención.

translation.en: - Thank God you saved her. - I didn't.
translation.es: - Menos mal que la salvaste. - No lo hice. Tuvo suerte.
- Menos mal que la salvaste. - No lo hice. Tuvo suerte. Ella…

translation.en: We used to be friends. You liked that prize poodle?
translation.es: - Éramos amigos. - ¿Te cae bien ese caniche?

translation.en: Why were you up that tower?
It's an art project for when the snow melts.
translation.es: Un proyecto de arte. Para cuando la nieve se derrita. Soy Raúl.
Para cuando la nieve se derrita. Soy Raúl.

translation.en: I don't do friends, Raúl. Bad things happen to people I'm close to.
translation.es: No tengo amigos, Raúl. Les pasan cosas malas a los que quiero.

translation.en: Now, this spectacular creature is called Thaumoctopus mimicus,
translation.es: Bien, esta criatura espectacular se llama Thaumoctopus mimicus.

translation.en: It's the only creature that can change its body shape to fool predators and prey.
translation.es: Es la única criatura que cambia de forma para engañar a predadores y presas.

translation.en: Now, you look like an adaptable girl.
Well, come on up, Kat. Get a close- up of this marvelous mollusk!
translation.es: Acércate, Kat. ¡Ven a ver este maravilloso molusco!

translation.en: Ah, okay. You've never seen this before, right?
Uh, well, the mark proves that you're special, Kat.
translation.es: Esa marca prueba que eres especial, Kat.

translation.en: But it has to be our secret.
- That's how I can protect you. - Protect me from what?
That stupid octopus. It bit me, right?
- It wasn't the octopus. - You're just protecting your job!
translation.es: - No fue él. - ¡Solo cuida su empleo!

translation.en: So, what do we believe just happened? Sweetie?
No, she's clearly telekinetic. Her mind can move matter.
translation.es: No, tiene poderes telequinéticos. Mueve cosas con la mente.

translation.en: Well, I would posit that Kay- Kay is an interrupter. A disturber of the status quo.
translation.es: Yo propongo que Kay-Kay es una agitadora. Una perturbadora del statu quo.

translation.en: Oh, come on, Siobhan, leave her alone.
It's none of your business, Ramona.
- - I'm sorry, Raúl. I keep forgetting.
Look at it. Our faire is so much better than Belzer's dump!
translation.es: Mira. Nuestra feria es mucho mejor que el basurero de Belzer.

translation.en: But you couldn't keep your mouth shut.
translation.es: Pero no pudiste mantener la boca cerrada.

translation.en: I was braggin' to the wrong demon.

translation.es: - Presumí con el demonio equivocado. - ¡Claro! Y Belzer dijo que era una insurrección, una rebelión.

translation.en: he called this an insurrection, a rebellion!
translation.es: Y Belzer dijo que era una insurrección, una rebelión.

translation.en: Now, we're stuck here for life!
Guess we got what we deserve.
We?! You have not begun to get what you deserve.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Tú ni has empezado a recibir lo que mereces.

translation.en: From the Land of the Living!
Good news, cousins! You've got a Hell Maiden!
That's the girl in our vision! Same one!
Yes. I've marked her hand so you'll know.
translation.es: Le marqué la mano para que la reconozcan.

translation.en: It's a new day in your miserable lives.
translation.es: ¡Es un nuevo día en sus miserables vidas!

translation.en: Imagine! She could summon us to the Land of the Living!
translation.es: ¡Podría invocarnos a la Tierra de los Vivos!

translation.en: But-- But demons aren't allowed up there. I mean, Belzer claims it's dangerous.
translation.es: No podemos ir allí. Belzer dice que es peligroso.

translation.en: Dangerous? Wild, he never even been there.
translation.es: ¿Peligroso? Wild, ni siquiera ha estado ahí.

translation.en: Then that's where we'll build our faire!
That's amazing, Wild. You're right! He would never know.
translation.es: ¡Qué gran idea, Wild! Nunca se enteraría.

translation.en: Shh! Not so loud. We're right under his nose!
So what do we do now?
Think it's time to see our Hell Maiden. Got any spare hair cream?
translation.es: Hora de ver a la doncella. ¿Hay más crema?

translation.en: Bloody council members in their tiny houses.
They blocked our prison before, Lane… and I'll blow beets if they block us again!
translation.es: Ya han rechazado la prisión, Lane. ¡Y vomitaré si lo vuelven a hacer!

translation.en: Can't bribe them, and they're-- they're too clever to be…
translation.es: No aceptan sobornos y son muy listos para…

translation.en: We have a new girl at RBC.
translation.es: Tenemos una niña nueva en RBC.

translation.en: Sweet Siobhan told Mummy all about her.
translation.es: Siobhan le contó a mamá todo sobre ella.

translation.en: Now the state's paying him to take in criminals.
translation.es: El estado paga para que acepte delincuentes.

translation.en: That's our business model, Bests. How dare you compete with Klax Korp!
translation.es: Ese es nuestro negocio, Bests. ¿Cómo se atreve a competir con Klax Korp?

translation.en: Well, technically, it's not competing if you have no prison.
translation.es: Ese es nuestro negocio, Bests. ¿Cómo se atreve a competir con Klax Korp? Técnicamente, no estoy compitiendo. No tienen una prisión.

translation.en: - - He's right, Lane. We need our own council members to win the vote.
translation.es: Es cierto, Lane. Necesitamos concejales para ganar la votación.

translation.en: Oh, yes, uh, the old- guard members. They would vote for you!
translation.es: Sí, los de la vieja guardia. Ellos votarían por ustedes.

translation.en: Ooh! Where do we find them, Father?
translation.es: Sí, los de la vieja guardia. Ellos votarían por ustedes. - ¿Dónde los encontramos, padre? - En los mejores mausoleos del cementerio.

translation.en: In the finest mausoleums in the cemetery.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde los encontramos, padre? - En los mejores mausoleos del cementerio.

translation.en: We are no longer going to prop you and your precious RBC up.
translation.es: Ya no financiaremos su preciada RBC.

translation.en: Irmgard, Lane, I vouched for you the night of the brewery fire.
translation.es: Yo los defendí la noche del incendio de la cervecería.

translation.en: Really, Raúl, your art project, now?
It's the final part of the mural, Mami.
translation.es: Ya casi termino el mural, mami.

translation.en: What do you mean, alleviate the situation?
- - But I am your top- earning paralegal. My success rate is higher than anyone on staff.
translation.es: Pero soy la mejor asistente legal. Mi tasa de éxito es la más alta.

translation.en: But you know that I'm fighting to keep my house, right?
translation.es: Estoy luchando por conservar mi casa.

translation.en: What am I supposed to do now? I have a son to feed.
translation.es: ¿Qué voy a hacer? Tengo un hijo que alimentar.
INFIERNO EN CERVECERÍA Sí. Sigo investigando el incendio.

translation.en: Look, Win, those workers were my friends, my neighbors.
translation.es: Win, esos empleados eran mis amigos, mis vecinos.

translation.en: I-- I know the Klaxons are dangerous.
translation.es: Sé que los Klaxon son peligrosos.

translation.en: But if I can link them to the fire, we can stop the prison for good. - All I need is an eye wit-- -
translation.es: Si pruebo que son culpables, no habrá prisión. Solo necesito un testi…

translation.en: Oh, so that's it? We're done?
Don't you dare hang up on me!
I really, really need to talk to you.
translation.es: De verdad necesito hablar con ustedes.

translation.en: You need to swim like we taught you. All the way up.
translation.es: Nada como te enseñamos. Hasta arriba.

translation.en: - Aren't you coming? - Right behind you, baby!
Now, listen to me, baby. You need to take a deep breath.
translation.es: - Mamá, ¡tengo miedo! - Bien, escucha. Debes respirar hondo.

translation.en: Who are you? What are you doing in my dream?
Uh…  You-- You've got the mark, right?
What mark? I don't have a mark.

translation.es: - Somos Wendell y Wild. - Tus demonios personales.
- Somos Wendell y Wild. - Tus demonios personales. - ¿Qué? - Puedes invocarnos.

translation.en: Well, you can summon us to the Land of the Living.
- Why would I do that? - 'Cause we'll give you whatever you want.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué lo haría? - Te daremos lo que quieras.

translation.en: Huh. Only thing I want is my parents.
- We can't raise the dead. - Well, we do know how to lie.
translation.es: - No podemos resucitarlos. - Pero sabemos mentir.

translation.en: - No problemo! - That's right! You do your bit…
- Well, I mean-- - What do you got to lose?
Fine. So what do I do?
- Okay, now, first, find Bearz- a- bub. - What's a Bearz- a- bub?
translation.es: - Primero, encuentra a Belzeboso. - ¿Qué es eso?

translation.en: Finds Hell Maidens for demons. Found you for us.
translation.es: Busca doncellas infernales. Te halló a ti.

translation.en: - Well, it marked your hand so we'd know. - Then what?
Then, you take it to the grave site next full moon.
translation.es: Llévalo a la tumba la próxima luna llena.

translation.en: - It'll tell you what to do. - Oh, yeah, one more thing!
translation.es: - Te dirá qué hacer. - ¡Una cosa más!

translation.en: Now, we'll both be in the dark.
Wakey- wakey, souls of the danged!
It's your Scream Faire Daddy! Say my name!
translation.es: ¡Es el papá de la Feria de los Gritos! ¡Digan mi nombre!

translation.en: Jeez! Can-- Can you believe that vainglorious blowhard? It's love him, can't leave him.
translation.es: - ¡Cielos! ¡Qué fanfarrón presumido! - Debes amarlo, no puedes irte.

translation.en: Danged souls have to praise him!
At our faire, folks'll be lined up wantin' to get in!
translation.es: En nuestra feria, harán fila para entrar.

translation.en: Only, how are we gonna pay for it? I know how.
Remember that rich soul of the danged? What, the-- the Nigerian Prince?
translation.es: - ¿Recuerdas esa alma en pena rica? - ¿El príncipe nigeriano?

translation.en: Yeah. He said if we helped him escape, he'd--
translation.es: Dijo que, si lo ayudábamos a escapar…

translation.en: That's nothing but a scam, Wild!  That's sound financial planning!
translation.es: - ¡Eso es una estafa, Wild! - ¡Es un plan de financiación!

translation.en: How 'bout I snap your horns off, rub 'em together, and make a fire?
translation.es: ¿Y si te saco los cuernos, los froto y hago una fogata?

translation.en: Stop the cart. Stop the cart!
Why you messin' with me, Wild? We got a serious problem to solve,
translation.es: ¿Por qué me molestas? Tenemos un problema serio, y dices…

translation.en: and-- and you up here talkin'--
translation.es: Tenemos un problema serio, y dices…

translation.en: I bet folks would pay a lot to come back from the dead, right?
translation.es: La gente pagaría mucho para revivir, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah, sure, only that was just a tick.
translation.es: Sí, pero solo era una garrapata.

translation.en: We need to test the cream on something bigger.
translation.es: Debemos probar la crema en algo más grande.

translation.en: Uh, what if we can't bring him back to life?
Look, a full moon'll be rising soon!
translation.es: Mira, la luna llena saldrá pronto.

translation.en: Got our very own Hell Maiden to summon us up! We'll dig up her parents and test the cream!
translation.es: - La doncella infernal nos invocará. - ¡Probaremos la crema en sus padres!

translation.en: And if it works? There'll be plenty of dough to build our faire!
translation.es: - ¿Y si funciona? - ¡Conseguiremos dinero para la feria!
Encomendamos al hermano… PADRE LEVEL BESTS

translation.en: Kay- Kay, sometimes it's harder to let go when you've just met.
translation.es: Quizá sea más difícil porque acababas de conocerlo.

translation.en: No, it's not. Father Bests saved your life.
translation.es: - No. - El padre Bests te salvó la vida.

translation.en: Maybe he was just trying to save the school.
Kay- Kay, it's customary to cast one's carnation on the lowering coffin.
translation.es: Kay-Kay, se acostumbra arrojar un clavel sobre el ataúd.

translation.en: Not Kay- Kay! Not my custom.
translation.es: ¡No soy Kay-Kay! Y yo no hago eso.

translation.en: Time to say goodbye, Kay- Kay.
- You're comin' with me. - What for?
I need a witness, and you're it.
translation.es: Necesito un testigo, y serás tú.

translation.en: Why do those poodles keep bothering me?
They want you to be like them.
Wow, you were a poodle too.
translation.es: Vaya, tú también eras un caniche.

translation.en: I… I tried to be but…

translation.es: Siobhan es buena para los padres que tiene.

translation.en: Oh, gosh! Did I make a sculpture or a mirror? You know what I'm sayin'?
Oh. Nope. That's not gonna work.
I'm doin' somethin'-- I'm doin' somethin' important.
Come on, Hell Maiden, summon us up!
Ms. Hunter said it was bad.
translation.es: La Sra. Hunter dijo que fue terrible.

translation.en: My mother thinks the fire was on purpose. Needs a witness to prove it.
translation.es: Mi mamá cree que fue intencional, pero necesita un testigo.
EL AMOR ES MÁS FUERTE QUE LA MUERTE

translation.en: You're, uh, gonna make a shrine?
Okay, now, tell me what to do.
Hand me to the Hell Maiden. Hell Maiden?
translation.es: - Pásame con la doncella infernal. - ¿Doncella infernal?

translation.en: Look, I made a deal. I'm bringing my parents back.
translation.es: Hice un trato. Reviviré a mis padres.

translation.en: I've got the cream here. I'm gonna put this…
translation.es: Aquí está la crema. Hay que poner…

translation.en: Flap it! Flap it! Flap it! Flap it!
- Flap it! Flap it! - Here we go!
Easy, Sparky, easy. Here we go…
Go back to sleep, go back to sleep!
Say something! Tell me what to do! Please!
Why weren't you two on the bus? - Uh, Kat needed me to be a witness? - It's my fault.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no estaban en el autobús? - ¿Kat quería un testigo?

translation.en: Didn't want to see my parents' grave alone.
translation.es: Fue mi culpa. No quería ver la tumba sola.

translation.en: Well, we have a long, cold walk back.
translation.es: Bien. Tendremos una fría y larga caminata de regreso.

translation.en: Eh, she'll show up at some point.
I say it's time to test the cream!
Ooh, that is one messed- up man of the cloth.
translation.es: Ese cura sí que está hecho trizas.

translation.en: Sure, but if we can raise him up, we can raise up anyone in the cemetery.
translation.es: Pero, si podemos revivirlo, podemos revivir a cualquiera.

translation.en: - It worked! - Whoo!  ♪ I believe in miracles ♪
- Who did it? - We did it!
You're back in good ol' Rust Bank, fully alive!
translation.es: ¡Está de vuelta en Rust Bank, vivo!

translation.en: Thank you, Lord, for this miracle!
Not Him! We brought you back!
Don't worry, Padre. We are the Magician Morticians.
Y- Y- Your work is remarkable!
Now, as far as payment goes…
Um, uh, I have to pay you?
Yeah, we're gonna build the best bemusement park ever! - We're gonna call it the Dream Faire! - Huh?
translation.es: - ¡Haremos el mejor parque de diversiones! - ¡La Feria de Ensueño!

translation.en: And you, and all your neighbors around here, gonna pay for it.
translation.es: Y usted y todos sus vecinos lo pagarán.

translation.en: I-- I-- I need to show you something.
Go ahead, raise all the dead you want,
translation.es: Adelante, resuciten a todos los que quieran,

translation.en: but there's no one here to pay for this faire.
translation.es: pero no hay nadie que pueda pagar por esa feria.

translation.en: What's to stop us from puttin' your janky ass back in the ground?
translation.es: ¿Qué nos impide poner su trasero de nuevo en el suelo?

translation.en: He's right, Lane. We need our own council members to win the vote.
translation.es: Es cierto, Lane. Necesitamos concejales para ganar la votación.

translation.en: Oh, yes, uh, the old- guard members. They would vote for you!
translation.es: Sí, los de la vieja guardia. ¡Ellos votarían por ustedes!

translation.en: W- W- Wait! Wait. I just had a vision.
Uh, uh, the Klaxons, uh, would gladly pay for your services.
translation.es: Los Klaxon pagarían por sus servicios.

translation.en: - Enough to build our Dream Faire? - With all the trimmings?
translation.es: - ¿Alcanzará para la feria? - ¿Y todos los adornos?

translation.en: Uh- huh. All that, and enough to save my school.
translation.es: Alcanzará para todo eso y para salvar mi escuela.

translation.en: Just tell me one thing before you go. Is our secret safe?
translation.es: Solo dime una cosa antes de irte. ¿Guardaste nuestro secreto?

translation.en: I know what you are, Kat. You're a Hell Maiden.
translation.es: Sé que eres una doncella infernal.

translation.en: But how could you know that? I'm… kind of an expert.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo puede saberlo? - Soy una especie de experta.

translation.en: And you do not want certain parties finding out about you.
translation.es: Y no quieres que cierta gente se entere de eso.

translation.en: Why do you care about me? I care because I was just like you.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué se preocupa por mí? - Me preocupo porque era como tú.

translation.en: Oh, so you were stupid too!
- You aren't stupid, Kat. - Stupid enough to get my parents killed!
translation.es: - No eres tonta, Kat. - Maté a mis padres.

translation.en: Stupid enough to just watch 'em drown,
translation.es: ¡Los vi ahogarse, ni siquiera traté de ayudar!

translation.en: not even try to help! Stupid enough to believe they could ever--
translation.es: ¡Los vi ahogarse, ni siquiera traté de ayudar! - Soy tan tonta que creí que… - ¡Basta! No fue tu culpa.

translation.en: Stop! It couldn't have all been your fault, Kat.
translation.es: - Soy tan tonta que creí que… - ¡Basta! No fue tu culpa.
No se parece en nada a mí.

translation.en: We were so worried, Kay- Kay, when you didn't get on the bus.
- Where were you? - You gonna arrest me, Klax Korp?
translation.es: Estábamos muy preocupadas, Kay-Kay. ¿Dónde estabas? - ¿Me arrestarás, Klax Korp? - ¿Arrestarte?

translation.en: - Arrest you? - You are the prison people.
translation.es: - ¿Me arrestarás, Klax Korp? - ¿Arrestarte? - Son los de la prisión. - Sí. Prisiones privadas.
- Son los de la prisión. - Sí. Prisiones privadas.

translation.en: With trauma therapy, full detox, and whole- being cleanses.
You ever been inside a private prison? Well, no.
translation.es: - ¿Has estado en una prisión privada? - Bueno, no.

translation.en: Maybe it was just some students messing with you.
translation.es: Quizá fue una broma de otras estudiantes.

translation.en: I said they were demons, Raúl!
My personal demons. And they lied!
Hmm. Maybe demons aren't the most trustworthy creatures to make a deal with.
translation.es: Los demonios no son las criaturas más confiables.

translation.en: It's your very own Father Bests.
Reports of my death were greatly exaggerated.
translation.es: Los rumores de mi muerte han sido muy exagerados.

translation.en: - - What?!  So, I am back on the job,
guiding this glorious institution into the future.
translation.es: Guiaré a esta gloriosa institución hacia el futuro.

translation.en: - Just-- - It's got to be a miracle, right?
They were supposed to bring my parents back, not you!
translation.es: ¡Debían revivir a mis padres, no a usted!

translation.en: Oh, uh, my- my… Oh, my! Really, Miss Elliot?
Forgive me, Father, but you wouldn't even be here without Kat.
translation.es: Usted no estaría aquí si no fuera por Kat.

translation.en: How is that, exactly? She's the one who summoned those demons--
translation.es: - ¿Cómo es eso? - Ella invocó a esos demonios…

translation.en: Well, if you can't explain yourselves, I have better things to do.
translation.es: Bueno, si no pueden explicarlo, tengo mejores cosas que hacer.
- Toma de rehenes en la oficina. - ¿Qué?
- Toma de rehenes en la oficina. - ¿Qué? - ¡Despliéguense, pingüinos! - No hicimos nada.

translation.en: Right now, you're wasting mine. - Girlie, move it! -
translation.es: - Y no la desperdiciaré con ustedes. - ¡Muévete!

translation.en: What the bloody hell? Bests' phone!
Remember your first demon, Helley? You were just 12 when we captured it.
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas a tu primer demonio, Helley? Tenías 12 cuando lo capturamos.

translation.en: Yes, made me summon demons, just so you could add them to your stupid collection.
translation.es: Sí, me hacías invocar demonios para añadirlos a tu tonta colección.

translation.en: I made you my right foot of justice, and you quit on me!
translation.es: ¡Te hice mi pie derecho de la justicia, y tú me abandonaste!

translation.en: It had nothing to do with justice! It was entrapment.
translation.es: ¡No se trataba de justicia! Era una trampa.

translation.en: There's a new Hell Maiden at RBC, isn't there?
translation.es: Hay una nueva doncella infernal aquí, ¿no?

translation.en: My bear would've told me she'd arrived, given me time to train and protect her.
translation.es: Mi oso me habría avisado con tiempo para que pudiera entrenarla y cuidarla.

translation.en: But you stole it from me.
And the new Hell Maiden has stolen it from you.
translation.es: Y la nueva doncella infernal te lo robó a ti.

translation.en: Open the door. - It's an emergency! - Oh!
Now, where are Kat and Raúl?
It sounded just like him on the phone.
translation.es: Parecía su voz en el teléfono.

translation.en: - You're supposed to be dead! - You look bloody hideous!
Wait! I- I- I can get you the votes!
- Ah! - For our new prison? - How? -
Um, we raised Padre, here. From the dead.
translation.es: - Revivimos al padre. - De entre los muertos.

translation.en: Now, they can raise the old- guard members you need.
translation.es: Pueden revivir a los concejales de la vieja guardia.

translation.en: The ones rotting in the cemetery?
Sure! Have 'em all cleaned up, ready to vote by morning.
Rich enough to build our Dream Faire?
We'll pull the permits, fast- track construction-- And Bob's your uncle!
RBC shall have our full financial support now!
Those brewery workers are in the same cemetery.
translation.es: Los empleados de la cervecería están en el cementerio.

translation.en: By the way, do you plan to raise anyone else from the dead?
translation.es: Por cierto, ¿planean resucitar a alguien más?

translation.en: Well, uh, our Hell Maiden's parents--
translation.es: Los padres de la doncella infernal…

translation.en: No, no! No, no, no, no, no!
If you raise anyone else in the cemetery--
It's no funfair, no RBC money!
translation.es: ¡No habrá feria ni dinero para RBC!

translation.en: - What? Hey, wait a minute-- - I promise!
Just your voters will be raised.
The old- guard graves? Exactly. All parked in a row.
translation.es: - ¿Las tumbas de los concejales? - Exacto. Todas en fila.

translation.en: Stop! Stop it! You promised my parents!
Yeah, you weren't up in here. So, we-- we made Bests our guinea pig.
translation.es: - No estabas aquí. - No. Usamos a Bests de conejillo de Indias.

translation.en: Ooh! What's that? Oh, that's our secret sauce.
That stuff'll bring my parents back? - Yep. - Um…
Klaxon said game over if we raise anyone else!
translation.es: Dijeron que no revivamos a nadie más.

translation.en: - Ho- Ho- Ho- Hold on, now! Hold on. - Not just yet! See…
That-- That-- That's not how it works… anymore.
- Mmm. - Well, first, you got to… to…
- That's right! - That wasn't the deal!
Hell Maiden, do you promise to serve us…
translation.es: - ¡Sí! - ¡Ese no era el trato! Doncella infernal, ¿prometes servirnos…?

translation.en: - You've gotta be kidding me. - Stop, Kat!
- - Leave it, Raúl! - The heck is he doin' up there? -
What'd you do, Wild? Wasn't me, Wendell. Skull mouth did it.
I know! Get us some take- out. We're starving!
Only place left is… Fawzi's Falafel.
translation.es: Solo queda El Faláfel de Fawzi.

translation.en: You and Sparky got graves to dig.
translation.es: Tú y Sparki deben cavar tumbas.

translation.en: Warned you, Raúl, bad things happen to people I'm close to.
translation.es: Te dije. Le pasan cosas malas a la gente que quiero.

translation.en: Come on, we haven't got all night.
- Six. - ♪ Wake up, dead man, work to do ♪
- Here we go! - ♪ Will make our dreams reality ♪

translation.es: Voten a favor de la prisión.

translation.en: - Whoa, that group was challenging! - Little dab to celebrate?
translation.es: - ¡Ese grupo fue un desafío! - ¿Crema para celebrar?

translation.en: Ticklin' our tummies. Hey, we earned it.
translation.es: - Da cosquillas en la pancita. - Lo merecemos.

translation.en: There won't be any left for Kat's parents!  I love that little Hell Maiden, but…
translation.es: - No quedará nada para los padres de Kat. - Adoro a esa doncella infernal, pero…

translation.en: If we raise her parents, the Klaxons won't build our Dream Faire.
translation.es: Si revivimos a sus padres, los Klaxon no construirán nuestra feria.

translation.en: I am so happy you're back, Kat!
Rust Bank needs some bright colors.
You want the hot sauce, right?
- And hey, don't be a stranger, hmm? - Thanks.
Uh, hey. You two need to head to town.
translation.es: Hola. Tienen que ir a la ciudad.

translation.en: - - You stole our cream, Raúl. Raised up our Hell Maiden's parents!
translation.es: - Nos robaste la crema, Raúl. - ¡Reviviste a los padres de la doncella!
Algo no anda bien ahí arriba.

translation.en: Wake up, you bums. Got a hair emergency.
translation.es: Despierten, vagos. Hay una emergencia capilar.

translation.en: How many dead folks have they raised?
♪ He's a germ- free adolescent ♪ ♪ Cleanliness is her obsession ♪
It's so wonderful to see you, Kat, but how is this possible?
translation.es: Es maravilloso verte, Kat, pero ¿cómo es posible?

translation.en: Hey! I still have the Cyclops, Dad.
translation.es: Oye, todavía tengo el cíclope, papá.

translation.en: That boom box could shake a room.
And this too, Mom. Was wondering where that went. Hmm.
translation.es: - Y esto, mamá. - Me preguntaba dónde estaba.

translation.en: I swear I told these people no deal.
translation.es: Juro que les dije que no había trato.

translation.en: Damn Klax Korp signs are everywhere!
You're a lot tougher, aren't you?
You-- You didn't kill us, Kat.
Only reason you crashed is 'cause I screamed.
Look, I made this deal with some demon brothers.
translation.es: Hice un trato con unos demonios.

translation.en: Because they promised to bring you back to life.
It wasn't demons. It was-- It was this kid, Raúl.
translation.es: No fueron demonios. Fue ese chico, Raúl.

translation.en: Raúl? Said he was your friend.
- He's in danger, isn't he? - Maybe.
If he's in danger, then we gotta go help him.
But I just got you back!

translation.es: Los amigos son como la familia.

translation.en: We do whatever we can for them.
translation.es: Hacemos lo que podemos por ellos.

translation.en: Fine, fine! I'll take care of Raúl.
translation.es: ¡Bien! Yo me encargo de Raúl, ustedes quédense en casa.

translation.en: You two just stay in the house where I can find you again.
translation.es: Yo me encargo de Raúl, ustedes quédense en casa.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no, no, no! What are we gonna do, Wendell?  If the Klaxons find out, our faire is toast!
translation.es: - ¡Ay, no! ¿Qué haremos, Wendell? - Si los Klaxon se enteran, ¡adiós, feria!

translation.en: - You gotta tell the Padre. - No, you have to tell him.
translation.es: - Díselo al padre. - No, hazlo tú.

translation.en: You're older, Wendell. You have to do it.
translation.es: Eres mayor, Wendell, tienes que hacerlo tú.

translation.en: Pipe down, Spark Plug! Can't hear ourselves think!
I smell somethin'. Our falafel dinner?
You greedy bug's turd! You ate our Hell Maiden!
translation.es: - ¡Maldito bicho glotón! - ¡Te comiste a la doncella infernal!

translation.en: Oh, and you ate little Raúl as well.
I'mma miss this cream when it's gone. Yeah, well, not as much as old Belzer.
translation.es: - Extrañaré la crema cuando se acabe. - No tanto como Belzer.

translation.en: So, you took my last two sons to the Land of the Living?
translation.es: ¿Llevaron a los dos hijos que me quedan a la Tierra de los Vivos?
Con mi crema para el pelo.

translation.en: See? That wasn't so hard, right?
Let go! My parents are waiting.
Your… dead parents? It was my fault they died.
translation.es: - ¿Tus padres muertos? - Murieron por mi culpa.

translation.en: I had to get them back. Let go of me!
Demons can't bring back the dead.
Well, they had this magic hair cream.
Raúl, tell Kat's parents I'll need her for a while.
translation.es: Raúl, diles a sus padres que la necesito un rato.

translation.en: Why should I do anything you tell me?
Oh, have you missed me, evil thing? Now, Manberg.
- - Wow. - She has sworn allegiance to her demons. -
translation.es: Vaya, les juró lealtad a sus demonios.
Y la fiebre se está extendiendo.

translation.en: - Well, only one thing to do… -
translation.es: Bueno, solo hay una cosa por hacer.

translation.en: You-- You don't understand, Manberg. Kat's demons are raising an army of the dead!
translation.es: No lo entiendes. ¡Sus demonios están creando un ejército de muertos!

translation.en: Yes! And we'll need two Hell Maidens to stop them!
Now, open the Redemption Chamber, Manberg.
translation.es: Abre la Cámara de la Redención, Manberg.
Es terrible… Me dijeron que ya no hay motivos para alegrarse.

translation.en: There's nothin' to be happy about anymore.
translation.es: Me dijeron que ya no hay motivos para alegrarse.

translation.en: Don't need this kind of aggravation.
Some say Rust Bank is already lost, a ghost town.
translation.es: Dicen que Rust Bank está perdido, que es un pueblo fantasma.

translation.en: - Oy! - So, why block Klax Korp again?
Because I know they caused the fire that killed our friends
translation.es: Causaron el incendio que mató a nuestros amigos

translation.en: - You're preaching to the choir, honey. - Let's get to voting!
translation.es: - No hace falta que lo digas, cariño. - ¡Votemos!

translation.en: All here in favor of Klax Korp Prison, raise your right hand.
translation.es: Quienes estén a favor de la prisión, levanten la mano.

translation.en: Uh, perdóname, but this is-- is council members only!
My Lord, Cassandra, it's the old- guard members!
In my professional opinion, these men are alive.
translation.es: Como profesional, opino que están vivos.

translation.en: Come on, Doc, you're just a foot guy.

translation.es: Los podólogos son médicos de verdad.

translation.en: It seems they do have a right to be here and the right to vote.
translation.es: Parece que tienen derecho a estar aquí y a votar.

translation.en: Mariana, have you lost your mind?
I have to, Fawzi. All living council members get to vote.
translation.es: Debo permitirlo, Fawzi. Todo concejal vivo puede votar.

translation.en: All those in favor of Klax Korp Prison, raise your right hand.
translation.es: Quienes estén a favor de la prisión, levanten la mano derecha.

translation.en: The yays have it, six to five.
translation.es: Ganó el sí, seis a cinco.

translation.en: Holy moly! Can that really be correct?
This'll keep you in wafers and wine. Eh, my school and my partners thank you.
translation.es: - Tome, para las hostias y el vino. - Mi escuela y mis socios se lo agradecen.

translation.en: Ah, and bless you, my child.
Mummy, Daddy, I know the truth about your prisons.
translation.es: Mamá, papá, sé la verdad sobre sus prisiones.

translation.en: Well, you make a pile of money for every prisoner you take.
translation.es: Ganan mucho dinero por cada prisionero que toman.

translation.en: So you pack them in like sardines, provide crap food, crap medical,
translation.es: Están como sardinas, hay mala comida, mala atención médica,

translation.en: I am proud of you, dear.

translation.es: Ese es nuestro modelo de negocios.

translation.en: Don't some people deserve a second chance? Like Kay- Kay?
Oh, we love those Break the Cycle kids.
translation.es: Nos encantan los niños de Rompe el Ciclo.

translation.en: Going to bus them in by the hundreds to your school.
translation.es: Llevarán a muchos a tu escuela.

translation.en: Then, we make it impossible for them to succeed there. And when they fail…
translation.es: Haremos que sea imposible que les vaya bien allí y, cuando fracasen…

translation.en: Our new prison will be waiting with open arms.
translation.es: Nuestra prisión los estará esperando con los brazos abiertos.

translation.en: You're really going to do it, aren't you? Demolish Rust Bank?
translation.es: En serio lo harán, ¿no? ¿Demolerán Rust Bank?

translation.en: The governor's coming, the press. Everybody will be there.
translation.es: Vendrán la gobernadora, la prensa, todos.

translation.en: - - Promise you'll be there, Siobhan. All smiles?
translation.es: Prométeme que estarás ahí con una sonrisa.

translation.en: Uh, I have to go now.
I-- I have to feed Gabby.
Oh, I'll be there, Mummy. I promise.
Kat, your memories are what fuels the fever.
translation.es: Kat, tus recuerdos son lo que alimenta la fiebre.
Es hora de enfrentar tu pasado.

translation.en: Make it stop, Sister Helley, please!
Only you can do that, Kat.
Go on now, own your memories!
But you made me a survivor!
I'm in control of my life now!
We saved RBC and the faire!
translation.es: ¡Salvamos a RBC y a la feria!

translation.en: Can't keep that money. - Why not? - Um…
Raisin' the dead didn't stop with the old guard.
You-- You raised Kat's parents? Wasn't us.
translation.es: - ¿Revivieron a los papás de Kat? - No fuimos nosotros.

translation.en: Was our ungrateful gravedigger! Him?! Oh, no, no, no, no, no!
- - So what's the game plan, Padre?
Ding- Dong Ditch… with a twist!
I-- I can see the future.
- What's goin' on? - Oh, no, oh, my!
She passed out, cracked her head.
translation.es: Se desmayó, se golpeó la cabeza.

translation.en: You don't get to smack me.
Good. You broke the fever, Helley.
translation.es: Bien. Le bajaste la fiebre, Helley.

translation.en: Thank you so much, Sister Helley!
It'll be unpredictable at first, but then--
translation.es: Al principio será impredecible, pero luego…

translation.en: - - Thank God, Kat! I've been looking all--
- Why are you here, Raúl? - Your parents, Kat.
They're gonna put them back in the ground. I just know it!
I'm going to kill Wendell and Wild!
translation.es: ¡Voy a matar a Wendell y Wild!

translation.en: With two Hell Maidens, we cannot fail!
translation.es: ¡Con dos doncellas infernales, no podemos fallar!

translation.en: Go ahead, Manberg. This Maiden needs a moment.
translation.es: Vayan, Manberg. Esta doncella necesita un momento.

translation.en: Fine. I-- I deserve the silent treatment.
translation.es: Bien. Merezco que no me hables. ¡Pero es una emergencia!
Merezco que no me hables. ¡Pero es una emergencia!

translation.en: - Bad goat, Gabby! Put that down! -
Gabby, stop! Where are you going?
Huh. I thought you'd be taller.
Ah, yes. May the Lord look kindly on you
translation.es: Ah, sí. Que el Señor los trate con bondad y les conceda la paz eterna.
Que el Señor los trate con bondad y les conceda la paz eterna.

translation.en: - All right, here it comes! - One, two…
- Kat was scarier when she was three. -
translation.es: Kat daba más miedo a los tres.

translation.en: It's, um--  N- No can do, Hell Maiden. You see… Uh, you s-- What-- You still got 800 tasks to complete.
translation.es: - Imposible, doncella. - Aún tienes 800 tareas por completar.

translation.en: That is right. So, as your masters, we order you to turn around and, uh…
translation.es: Exacto. Así que, como tus amos, te ordenamos que te des vuelta y…

translation.en: Why'd you do it? Uh, they-- they-- they were just my size, and I--
translation.es: - ¿Por qué lo hiciste? - Eran de mi número, y yo…

translation.en: Not the boots, my parents! Why were you putting them in their graves?
translation.es: Las botas no, ¡mis padres! ¿Por qué querían enterrarlos?

translation.en: P- Padre here said it was the only way. To save our Dream Faire.
translation.es: - El padre dijo que era la única forma. - De salvar la feria.

translation.en: And it was the only way to save my school. What?
translation.es: - Y la única forma de salvar mi escuela. - ¿Qué?

translation.en: What's going on here, Kay- Kay?
Well, for starters, Sister Helley and I are Hell Maidens.
translation.es: Bueno, la hermana Helley y yo somos doncellas infernales

translation.en: And if you call me Kay- Kay one more time--
translation.es: y si me dices Kay-Kay de nuevo…

translation.en: O- Of course, you are a Hell Maiden, Kat.
translation.es: Claro, eres una doncella infernal, Kat.

translation.en: Father Bests, my parents don't want to save your school.
translation.es: Padre Bests, mis papás no salvarán su escuela ni construirán una feria.
mis papás no salvarán su escuela ni construirán una feria.

translation.en: It's how they pay all Klax Korp personnel. Worthless in the real world.
translation.es: Así le pagan al personal de Klax Korp. No tiene valor.

translation.en: I need to show you something.
You were right, Kat, about my parents.
translation.es: Tenías razón, Kat. Sobre mis padres y las prisiones privadas.
Sobre mis padres y las prisiones privadas.

translation.en: What-- What do you mean? There's not gonna be a Rust Bank anymore!
translation.es: - ¿Por qué? - Rust Bank dejará de existir.

translation.en: I smell the blood of two thieving bums!
translation.es: ¡Huelo la sangre de dos vagos ladrones!

translation.en: Oh, this is better than the undead army!
translation.es: ¡Esto es mejor que el ejército de muertos!
¿Dónde está mi crema para el cabello?

translation.en: Everyone, down to the hearse, and don't draw attention!
translation.es: Vayan al coche fúnebre y no llamen la atención.

translation.en: I'm not going to hurt you.
There you are, my thieving mutts!

translation.es: ¡El papá de la Feria de los Gritos los…

translation.en: Wh- Wh- Wh- What, steal your cream?
Come to the Land of the Living?
translation.es: ¿Venir a la Tierra de los Vivos?

translation.en: My Scream Faire did not need some radical new design!
translation.es: ¡Mi feria no necesitaba un cambio radical!
El proyecto de arte de Raúl.
Un padre protegiendo a su hijo.

translation.en: What we all try to do.
There were others before you that ran away. We had siblings?
translation.es: - Hubo otros antes de ustedes que huyeron. - ¿Teníamos hermanos?

translation.en: Hell with them, I said. They'll be back, tails between their legs.
translation.es: Al diablo con ellos, dije. Ya volverán arrepentidos.

translation.en: Fine, Mr. Belzer. I, Manberg the Merciless,
translation.es: Bien, Sr. Belzer. Yo, Manberg el Despiadado, soy un enemigo declarado de los demonios.

translation.en: am a sworn enemy of demons,
translation.es: Yo, Manberg el Despiadado, soy un enemigo declarado de los demonios.

translation.en: I have all your missing children.
translation.es: Tengo a todos sus hijos desaparecidos.

translation.en: Let my friends go, and they're yours.
translation.es: Deje ir a mis amigos, y serán suyos.

translation.en: uh, reports of my death were greatly exaggerated…
translation.es: que los rumores de mi muerte han sido muy exagerados…

translation.en: He dead again? Gave him plenty of cream.
translation.es: - ¿Se murió otra vez? - Le di mucha crema.

translation.en: Dang, you raised him from the dead with hair cream?
translation.es: Vaya, ¿lo resucitaron con crema para el cabello?

translation.en: Come on, boys, that stuff just don't last.
Can't build a new faire without the designers.
translation.es: No puedo crear una feria sin diseñadores.

translation.en: - You mean us? - We'll make you proud, Pop!
Stuff don't last? What about my parents?!
No, a- a- all that's required is a-- a fresh dose of cream. Worked for Padre.
translation.es: - Solo necesitan más crema. - Funcionó con el padre.

translation.en: - Squeeze it right, be enough for days. - Weeks!
Hmm. Now we have loved every single second with you, baby, but Rust Bank's in trouble.
translation.es: Amamos estar contigo, pero Rust Bank está en problemas.

translation.en: What if that last bit of magic could help save our town?
translation.es: ¿Y si esa magia que queda podría ayudar a salvar a la ciudad?

translation.en: I already told you it's too late!
No, Kat, you can change that future.
translation.es: No, Kat, puedes cambiar ese futuro.

translation.en: My mother thinks the fire was on purpose. Needs a witness to prove it.
translation.es: Mi mamá cree que fue intencional, pero necesita un testigo.

translation.en: Raúl, raise a dead brew worker.
translation.es: Raúl, resucita a un cervecero muerto.

translation.en: If you squeeze it right, be enough for two. Three witnesses!
translation.es: - Aprieta bien y alcanzará para dos. - ¡Tres testigos!

translation.en: Meanwhile, we're gonna protect Rust Bank 'til he gets back.
translation.es: Protegeremos Rust Bank hasta que vuelva.

translation.en: Everyone, ready to hold that line?
Down with Klax Korp! Down with Klax Korp!
Down with Klax Korp! Down with Klax Korp!
translation.es: KLAX KORP CREA PUESTOS DE TRABAJO

translation.en: But Lane, Siobhan promised Mummy she'd come!
translation.es: Pero, Lane, Siobhan le prometió a mamá que vendría.

translation.en: We have to start, Irmgard. Governor Bribes.
translation.es: Tenemos que empezar, Irmgard. Gobernadora Bribón.

translation.en: No more Klax Korp! No more Klax Korp! - No more Klax Korp! -
Today, it's out with the old
and in with the newest, biggest construction project in our state's history!
translation.es: con el proyecto de construcción más grande de la historia del estado.

translation.en: Now, my partners in crime, Lane and Irmgard Klaxon!
translation.es: Ahora, mis cómplices, ¡Lane e Irmgard Klaxon!

translation.en: - - Thank you. Thank you. No need, thank you.
When your governor offered us millions to build our prison here,
translation.es: Cuando su gobernadora nos ofreció millones para construir aquí,

translation.en: we fell in love with Rust Bank.
A love sorely tested by that lot!
translation.es: ¡Un amor que fue puesto a prueba por ese grupo!

translation.en: Should I do the honors, Irmgard?
Go! Go! Go! Crush them all!
♪ I know it's strange Another way to get to know you ♪
Good old Soul Jockeys.  Dad must've sent them.
translation.es: - Los viejos Almadictos. - Papá debe haberlos enviado.

translation.en: Lane and Irmgard Klaxon, you're under arrest for arson and homicide.
translation.es: Lane e Irmgard Klaxon, están arrestados por incendio y homicidio.

translation.en: Can't prove a bloody thing without witnesses!
Wait, wait! It was all her doing!
- My wife's the murderer, not me! - How dare you, Lane?!
translation.es: - Mi esposa es la asesina. - ¿Cómo te atreves, Lane?

translation.en: Good news, everyone! Klax Korp is finished!
Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no.
Poor Hell Maiden. Cream lost its magic.
translation.es: - Pobre doncella. - La crema perdió su magia.

translation.en: Tell us about Rust Bank, Kat, in the future.
translation.es: Cuéntanos el futuro de Rust Bank, Kat.

translation.en: Hold tight, and close your eyes.
translation.es: Agárrense fuerte y cierren los ojos.

translation.en: Rust Bank's comin' back to life.
I'm doin' stuff with Sister Helley
- How much do we love her, Delroy? - So, so, so much.
You know, once our Dream Faire gets built…
It's gonna be about the best afterlife, upstairs or down.
translation.es: Será lo mejor del más allá, arriba o abajo.

translation.en: What do you mean?  Your parents!
Yeah, get them an all- inclusive VIP pass!
translation.es: ¡Dales un pase vip con todo incluido!

translation.en: Well, now, hold on. J- J- Just-- Just check it out.
I was supposed to hate myself for the rest of my life.
translation.es: Pensé que me odiaría toda la vida.

translation.en: Mom, Dad, I… What do you think?
But now, I don't have to.
I'm a Hell Maiden with amazing friends.
translation.es: Soy una doncella infernal con amigos geniales.
LA VIDA EN RBC YOGA HOLÍSTICO CON CABRAS

translation.en: ♪ Her ass is round ♪ ♪ Her breasts are sweet ♪
translation.es: MANUAL DE OPERACIÓN Y MANTENIMIENTO TOPADORA

translation.en: ♪ She is sweet- tasting fruit ♪ ♪ Whose juice is bitter tears ♪
translation.es: SIETE AÑOS, SEIS AÑOS… PRIMER DÍA EN CASA

translation.en: It's pretty late. It's 3:30 in the morning.
translation.es: Es bastante tarde. Son las 3:30 a. m.

translation.en: And I just woke up because I heard some noises next door,
translation.es: Y me desperté porque escuché unos ruidos en la habitación de al lado,

translation.en: in the room next door, and you won't believe what-- what I found.
translation.es: Y me desperté porque escuché unos ruidos en la habitación de al lado, y no creerán lo que encontré.

translation.en: I'm going to open the door now.
Maybe she was getting bored at the studio, alone.
translation.es: Quizá se aburría sola en el estudio.
